TopicTitle: Mk I Cockpit IVA Bubble Canopy

Articles.Content:
Hi all. I'm in search of a Mk I IVA that removes the sight-obstructing canopy structure. From the outside, they obviously don't belong, and just imagine the joy of flying IVA with a full view of the sky!
